name: Femke van Raamsdonk

equational programming in spring 2020 in period 4: advanced logic bachelor projects in period 5 and 6: please send me an email (f.van.raamsdonk at vu.nl) if you are interested in a bachelor project in theoretical computer science the theory group offers in the Master Computer Science at the VU the specialization Foundations of Computing and Concurrency the Master Courses we offer are available via
